definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)

sentences.english: Our School stands on the ground of the Cheung Ching Estate among greeny hills and waters.
sentences.chinese: 我们的学校，迄立在青山绿水的长青邨。

sentences.english: We were charmed with the blue hills and green streams here.
sentences.chinese: 我们陶醉在这里的绿水青山之中。

sentences.english: Keeping water clean, mountain green, sky clear and harmony.
sentences.chinese: 为广东人民留绿水青山，存碧海蓝天，共享和谐。

sentences.english: Lady Vashj slithers up from some green water in the prison.
sentences.chinese: 瓦许女士不稳的在有毒的绿水里滑行，慢慢的站起来。

sentences.english: So desolate are the blue hills and green streams.
sentences.chinese: 绿水青山却是一片苍凉。

sentences.english: Therefore, I reluctantly looked back, it is a desolate lies.
sentences.chinese: 所以我恋恋不舍回头张望，绿水青山却是一片苍凉。

sentences.english: Rafting roaming and saw a reflection of the lake-green water lake, full of poetic.
sentences.chinese: 泛舟漫游，只见一湖绿水半湖倒影，充满诗情画意。

sentences.english: Dalliance mountains in China, you can completely blend together with nature.
sentences.chinese: 在青山绿水中徜徉，你完全可与大自然交融在一起。

sentences.english: We have a beautiful campus surrounded by green hills and clear lakes.
sentences.chinese: 我们拥有青山绿水环绕的美丽的校园。

sentences.english: I'm going to take a rest, in green mountains and clear waters.
sentences.chinese: 我要休息一下，去青山绿水之间肆意行走。

sentences.english: Along the way are remote mountains, deep valleys, so green, so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 沿途崇山峻岭，沟谷深陷，绿水青山，美轮美奂。

sentences.english: The clean lakes and green hills witnessed the growing wood of parent-child community of TangTang network rooted here.
sentences.chinese: 绿水青山，见证糖糖网亲子成长林在这里扎根。

sentences.english: New Castle is not the old two-shou, a green Evergreen world.
sentences.chinese: 青山不老双新寿，绿水长荣一世人。

sentences.english: In China, green water accounts for almost 60 per cent of agricultural water.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，绿水占了农业水的将近60%。

sentences.english: Preserve the green mountains and clear rivers for posterity
sentences.chinese: 为子孙后代留下青山绿水。

definition: Qingshan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei/Qingshan district of Baotou city 包頭市|包头市[Bao1 tou2 shi4], Inner Mongolia
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
